A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This a \"you either hate it or love it\" movie. The same people that hate the prequels keep hating. There are. A few minor details that i would have changed\, but i was glued. Kylo gained my respect as a villain (in force awakens he was weak and pathetic). I didn't know how i felt about Luke in the beginning and middle of the movie\, but the end effectively finished his character development.
